scopecontent.p: This collection includes a book entitled "Receipts Culinary" belonging to a member of the Hopkinson family. Book includes handwritten recipes and newspaper clippings. Included in the volume are some table arrangements for different courses at various dinner parties thrown by the Hopkinsons. Guests names are included on one chart and consist of some of Philadelphia's prominent families, including Biddle, Read, Walsh, Butler, Mease, and others.
